attributes.action: Reduce the cost of the TV Licence Fee
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to reduce the TV Licence fee as this pays for the BBC which I hardly watch.  I would rather pay for what I watch than a flat fee.  I watch Top Gear and the minimal sport the bbc offer which after the F1 deal announced today is reducing rapidly.  I would happily have all BBC TV and Radio Channels barred from my TV and pay no licence fee.
